show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
• Foreplay can begin with taking out the garbage! Should cancer screening be limited in the elderly? Why you need to have a wellness coach.
Is prayer the answer for anxiety?
A simple, fun, and healthy solution to improve your children’s grades.
Vicki’s 20-20 tips are: Recipe for natural mosquito repellent A common kitchen herb that can enhance your memory and more.
